div1.p: Brill discusses details concerning the publication of Hench's Alpha Omega Alpha lecture by the society.

div1.head: Letter from G. Meredith Brill to Philip Showalter Hench, April 27, 1948
div1.opener:
Alpha Omega Alpha Honor Medical Society
“”
MRS. WILLIAM W. ROOT
ASST. GENERAL SECRETARY-TREASURER
G. MEREDITH BRILL
MANAGING EDITOR THE PHAROS
AA
1902
FOUNDED BY WILLIAM W. ROOT
SLATERVILLE SPRINGS, N. Y.
April 27, 1948
Dear Doctor Hench:
div1.p:
Thank you very much for your letter of April 21st, enclosing a corrected
copy of your talk. We sent it post-haste to the printer, who is making
the changes.

We are writing immediately to the editor of the University of Virginia
News for the cut of Dr. Reed, and we would like very much to have the
print of “Building Number One.” Will you send it to me at your early
convenience?

I will send the galley proof of your article to you within the next few
days and we are very happy to have you correct it. I am sure that your
lecture will proof of vast interest to our readers. This issue is going
out to the entire lving membership of around 16,000 members. Thank you
again for your cooperation.
